answers.answer: The Dopomoha platform, a Commit Global solution, is designed to support refugees. It offers solutions such as "Law made simple" to help citizens understand their rights and obligations, and "PTSD Help" as a free assistant for managing Post Traumatic Stress Disorder. Additionally, it provides guidance on essential hygiene practices, including hand washing, proper utensil use, managing water needs in crisis, and tips for making or reusing diapers, indicating a broader focus on health and basic needs support.

For more details, visit https://dopomoha.ro/en/hygiene

answers.answer: Dopomoha offers support in various areas including Housing, Education, Health, and Transportation. It provides specific solutions for refugees such as "Law made simple" to help citizens understand their rights and obligations, and "PTSD Help" as a free assistant for managing Post Traumatic Stress Disorder. Additionally, it offers practical health and hygiene guidance, including tips on hand washing, water usage for crisis situations, proper utensil use, and instructions on how to make and reuse diapers. A call center is also available for support.

answers.answer: Information about hygiene and safety tips can be found in the "Hygiene" section. This section offers guidance on protecting health, including frequent hand washing with soap, proper hand sanitization if water and soap are unavailable, the importance of individual or thoroughly cleaned utensils, and instructions on how to make or reuse diapers.
